mapper.select: SELECT BUDGETY AS YEAR, BUDGETQ AS QUARTER, BUDGET, S.USERSCODE, NAME, TO_CHAR(CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD') INPUTDATE FROM BUDGET B JOIN STAFF S ON B.USERSCODE = S.USERSCODE WHERE BUDGETY=#{year} AND BUDGETQ=#{quarter}
mapper.update: UPDATE BUDGET SET BUDGET=#{budget}, USERSCODE=#{usersCode}, CREATED=SYSDATE WHERE BUDGETY=#{year} AND BUDGETQ=#{quarter}
